content: Ok, I just want to let you know that I really believe in this project. I found a lot of Sheffield based possible donators of sand online! But I was kind of imagining including the community and everyone can like bring a box of sand and pour it in one space and give a little speach before doing it on an open mic. Like a sentence about what they want to change in the Sheffield community. And with this little amount of sand they brought they would contribute visibly because at the end of every speech there woud be a bigger amonut and at the end, a sandbox! I feel like crying from emotions. I kinda feel it could show them that change and making something bigger is possible if we get together...
